name: Froggy Splash
description:
Froggy Splash is a physics game where you have to jump high, execute perfect bounces and surf dangerous waves in beautiful environments.

! Join the over 10 million people who have already enjoyed Froggy's adventures!


FEATURES:
- Beautiful dynamic waves
- Easy one-touch control
- Physics-based, fast-paced gameplay with ragdoll Froggy
- Deep upgrade system to reach incredible distances
- 2 beautiful and stylish locations
- Various statistics
- Full Game Center integration: leaderboards, achievements, challenges


COMING SOON:
- Cool new Froggy upgrades
- Powerups
- New achievable locations
